name: Turboggan
description:
Turboggan! A game where you have a rocket powered vehicle which is built for sliding down a slope full of landmines, unkept trees, and possessed headbobbing snowmen. It is up to you to reach the bottom of the hill safely and return to your loving (nonexistent) family. Good luck!

A concept I've been thinking of while I was developing my main project. However this game is very much incomplete so don't expect too much.

First game and first game jam!

Credit to Lann094 for some of the sound effects
